text: António José Baptista Cardoso e Cunha (28 January 1933 – 24 January 2021) was a Portuguese Social Democratic Party (PSD) politician. He was a government minister in the 1970s and 1980s. From 1986 to 1992, he was Portugal's first European Commissioner. He was elected to the Assembly of the Republic in 1978. Cardoso e Cunha died on 24 January 2021, aged 87.Portugal: Cardoso e Cunha, first Portuguese EU commissioner, dies at 87 ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Portuguese politicians Category:European Union politicians
title: António Cardoso e Cunha
